Organization based in.content:

However, it does mention the city of New Orleans, which implies that the Associated Press (AP) is likely headquartered or primarily operates in this location. This is an example of the pattern where the organization (AP) is associated with a specific location (New Orleans).

| --- | --- | --- |
| Associated Press (AP) | New Orleans | Yes |

The paragraph you provided is a city name and a part of a news headline written in the AP (Associated Press) style, which is typically used for news reporting. It does not contain any information about a person residing or having resided in a specific location.

- Grew up in
